title: Jem's Play Areas and Family-Friendly Amenities
blurb: Discover Jem's play areas and family-friendly amenities.
description: Jem offers a variety of amenities catering to families and children. These include dedicated play areas designed for kids of different age groups, providing a safe and engaging environment for play. Additionally, Jem provides family-friendly facilities such as nursing rooms and diaper changing stations, ensuring convenience for parents with young children. The shopping mall also hosts occasional events and activities suitable for families, creating a vibrant and welcoming atmosphere for all visitors. Jem strives to create a comfortable and enjoyable experience for families visiting the mall, with amenities and services designed to meet their needs.

title: Jem Play: Honeycomb-Themed Playground at Level 5
blurb: Kids climb, crawl, and revel in imaginative adventures!
description: Jem Play is a honeycomb-themed playground located at Level 5 of Jem. It offers families with children a space to climb across an exciting canopy, crawl through safe and fun nests and hammocks, making their own little nest world as they revel in an imaginative adventure with dry and water play amidst open spaces. It is designed to provide an engaging and fun experience for children of various ages, promoting physical activity and imaginative play in a safe environment within the mall.

title: Jem Park: Cascading Sky Park and Green Spaces
blurb: Soothing environment to recharge during your shopping day.
description: Jem Park is a cascading sky park concept with green spaces and rooftop gardens tiered across Levels 5 to 7 of Jem. It offers shoppers a soothing environment to recharge as they spend their day at the mall. Designed as part of Jem’s green replacement strategy, it returns green space back to the community. The park provides a relaxing atmosphere with greenery and open spaces, allowing visitors to take a break from shopping and enjoy a peaceful environment within the urban setting.
datetime_display: open spaces! Jem Street Jem Street offers streetside shopping and al fresco dining

title: Jem Street Shopping and Al Fresco Dining Experience
blurb: Streetside shopping and al fresco dining at Jem Street.
description: Jem Street offers a delightful experience with streetside shopping and al fresco dining. Stroll down Jem Street, explore the latest designs at H&M, or enjoy casual dining at outlets like McDonald’s, Marché, Starbucks, and Aburi-En. The idyllic ambience is perfect for a relaxing afternoon with family and friends. Enjoy a variety of culinary delights and retail therapy in a comfortable and inviting setting. Jem Street provides a unique and enjoyable experience for all visitors seeking a leisurely day out.

title: Jem Food Hall: A Foodie's Paradise at Basement 1
blurb: Delectable selection of tasty nibbles and hearty meals.
description: Jem Food Hall, located at Basement 1, is a foodie’s paradise complete with food stalls, cafés, and restaurants. Shoppers can indulge in a delectable selection of tasty nibbles, snacks, and hearty meals. The Food Hall offers a diverse range of culinary options, from local delights to international flavors, ensuring there's something for everyone. It's the perfect spot to grab a quick bite or enjoy a leisurely meal with family and friends while exploring the mall. Experience a vibrant and satisfying dining experience at Jem Food Hall.
